summary: This document is a sworn statement from a forensic accountant and private investigator hired by Cohen & Gresser LLP to independently review a Financial Condition Report on Ghislaine Maxwell's assets from 2015-2020. The expert details their qualifications and concludes the report is a complete and accurate summary of Maxwell's assets, those of her husband, and assets held in trust for her benefit.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The financial condition report reviewed by the expert summarizes assets held by Maxwell, her husband, and in trust for her benefit for 2015-2020.

events.title: Financial Condition Review Period
events.description: The time period covered by the Financial Condition Report prepared by Macalvins Accountants summarizing Ghislaine Maxwell's financial condition and assets.

keyFacts: A forensic accountant was hired by Cohen & Gresser LLP to independently verify a Financial Condition Report on Ghislaine Maxwell's assets from 2015-2020.
The expert concluded the Financial Condition Report was a complete and accurate summary of assets held by Maxwell, her husband, and assets held in trust for her benefit.
The expert had full access to all underlying documents and could pose questions to the accountants (Macalvins) who prepared the original report.
